website_summaries.verdict: A stain-resistant, highly absorbent wrap that both your dog and your wallet will love.
pros: These true to size wraps are a more affordable alternative to many of their competitors
Material is both comfortable and absorbent
Wraps are available in appealing neutral colors
The black interior of the wrap ensures no unfortunate yellow stains
cons: Wraps take a long time to dry

customer_reviews.title: They Really Really Work!
customer_reviews.text: These really work the best of all the belly wraps I have tried. Being elastic on both sides is what makes it work. We’ve had a problem with out Chihuahua marking for years. These belly wraps have saved our new house. I wish I would of found these a long time ago. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: No Gross Yellow to See
customer_reviews.text: We have two male terriers, 10-14lbs. One dog is 18 year old, and can't hold his bladder all the time anymore. The other one started marking in the house once the old dog started goofing up. What a mess! I have ordered these types of diapers before, but I didn't like the strange colors. (Aqu-blue? Orange? Yellow?) I like that these Paw Legend diapers are black on both sides, so you don't have to see the "yellow" inside. I usually wash a batch of these twice, which removes the odor. I also use bleach, and they have stay color-fast after at least 50 washings.
customer_reviews.author: Slidellgirl

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but the sizing was way off!! My jack russell could barely fit into the medium and I had to return it and order a large. Update: My dog is a fat jack russell and these diapers run small. He's 24 pounds and requires a large. Now that we have the right size, they are very absorbant and do not leak. My dog has smooth hair and is able to worm out of his diaper. I recommend using a baby onsie. A 24 pound kind of chunky Jack Russell Terrier wears a 3T onsie.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: The company was quick to respond and sent me a new set
customer_reviews.text: The company was quick to respond to my negative review and sent me another set. I got the XXS for my dog which is a better fit then the XS that his measurement indicated he should have (every dog is different so the fit is somewhat a guess til you try them - my dog is a petite 4 lb Yorkie)). The new set is much better - fit better - wash better- smell better and I am quite pleased. The company really cares about their product and want them to work well. 5 stars for the quick responsive and integrity of the company.
customer_reviews.author: mel Sprink

customer_reviews.title: STRONG velcro!
customer_reviews.text: These work well and wash up nicely, although they do take a long time to dry due to the absorbent layer. The velcro is VERY strong and takes a bit of effort to pull apart so it is not going to come apart while your dog is wearing them. The absorbancy is sufficient for daytime when I can let my dog outside regularly, but I add extra pads for night time and the belly wrap and both extra pads that I insert are totally soaked. Keep in mind that my dog has kidney disease and drinks huge amounts of water and therefore urinates huge amounts.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Durable, Absorbent doggie diapers
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the BEST reusable doggie diapers. I have gotten many others but these hold up in wash after wash. The velcro on these really stay on and in tact. Others I brought fell apart after less than a month of washes. These haven't! I have had these since August 1 2017 they still are holding strong. Highly recommended If you are looking not only for urine control absorption but also durability. Photos - White one is another brand - Green/black one is Paw Legend. I wanted to show one that we have used and how well it holds up to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsladykitty

customer_reviews.title: You gotta be kidding me. 🤬
customer_reviews.text: I literally just received this package 30 minutes ago was excited to test it out these XS on my tiny Pomeranian who is about 4lbs and I am extremely annoyed. The sizing is ALL WRONG!! I’ve been waiting for this for a week only to find out this is useless to my dog now. I based it on the sizing from customer reviews and the size chart itself from what was posted. I would have understood if the sizing was off like an inch or so.. The diapers I received should fit a Guinea pig. I needed a S. Thought these would help save $ from buying disposable ones every week but now I just wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLoverTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for our pug (in a large) and they fit great. Very soft and absorbent, and much better than other options we've tried (with removable/disposable pads that bunch and need replaced). I'll definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: The wraps are not even close to the same size even thought the are labeled them same size.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in a small. All three wraps had a tag in them that said they are a size small. However, only one was a size small the other two were so big they skipped off of my dog as soon as I put it on him. When I placed them on top of each other they obviously larger than the smallest one. I wish I could return them but he wore the smallest one first and I didn't know the other two were too big until I put one on him and it slippedoff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are also difficult to clean - just rinsing probably won't work - be sure to soak in warm vinegar-water mix every now and then - that works better than putting them thru the washing machine
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 lb naughty Chihuahua, got the small, and they fit well. These actually stay on compared to others that he has been able to wiggle and dance out of. The tough part with these, as another reviewer said, is that with the black lining it is difficult to visually see if they are wet. They are also difficult to clean - just rinsing probably won't work - be sure to soak in warm vinegar-water mix every now and then - that works better than putting them thru the washing machine. I ordered a second set because they do take awhile to dry.
customer_reviews.author: kgood

customer_reviews.title: Protection is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my male stud dogs. Stud dogs will mark everywhere and anywhere even the girls ... Yuck, but these take care of any mishaps. I used to use belly bands without the inner protection these have. I used lady's sanitary pads cut in half but that of course is a nuisance. These are very well made, the quality of the fabric and the strength of the Velcro are top and the fit is perfect. I highly recommend these for dogs that have accidents or stud dogs that mark. They are very absorbent however they do need to be changed throughout the day about 2-3 times or as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hollingberry

customer_reviews.title: I love the diapers
customer_reviews.text: We have a new house, new baby and my 8 year old dachshund started acting up with all the changes we've had. I had to buy a steam cleaner bc he would pee on the rug every time he saw us hold the new baby! So, the diapers for the dog help me have a little less anxiety -- esp with visitors wanting to see the baby (I don't want someone seeing the dog rebel! How embarrassing!) hopefully the diapers are only temporary! He can drag his belly and wriggle out of them but I think it's due to his hotdog shape. Overall, I love the diapers.
customer_reviews.author: DachshundGirl

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size larger than I thought was needed based on previous reviews. However they were almost too snug on my 13 pound male dog. Woke in the middle of the night and the band was laying on the bed, so they obviously come off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: WCW1

customer_reviews.title: Velcro parts are too strong
customer_reviews.text: When we first received these I noticed the Velcro was very strong but as I used them and washed them the Velcro has become way too difficult to pull apart. I have use both hands and teeth to pull it apart. Not only that, but my dogs fur also gets pulled and yanked off from this Velcro. Wish I hadn't purchased two sets of them. As a note...I purchased another brand for my smaller dog and that Velcro and material have been much easier to use and kept a better shape than this brand
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Size M an OK fit for 18lb doxie
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are the best fit for our little sausage boy, but so far they seem well made and secure. Our dog measures close to 20" around his hind quarter belly. The Velcro fastens right to its edge so I'm wondering if Small might have been a better option, especially because the band would be narrower. Thankfully, we should only need these temporarily while our dog recovers from bladder stones surgery--and is a little bit "leaky"--so they'll do.
customer_reviews.author: miriam r

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality but it is too small.
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dog carefully and read the q & a and felt confident ordering a size medium for my dog. His waist is 18”. However they are too small for my liking. I can put them on him, but it has to be really tight and it’s not comfortable. I emailed ya’ll right away, and didn’t receive a reply. I emailed again last week, still no answer. This is a very well made product, I have no complaints at all about quality, but the sizing listed for the size medium isn’t correct.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Can't keep them on the dog without tightening them so much that he can barely walk. He just slides out of them when he stretches out in his in bed. It's basically just a padded band that goes around the dog's middle right in front of his hind legs. Even snugly wrapped, though, I guess your dog needs a bigger butt than mine to keep them on. He doesn't reject them, just slips out. Useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyMouth

customer_reviews.title: Lack of business ethics
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are really great, easy to wash. When I used the olive diaper and remove it from the dog, the velcro came completely off. When I examined the velcro it looked like it wasnt properly sewed correctly and secured enough for sell. I emailed paw legend along with these pics and wanted my Amazon account #, coupon code this and that, etc. etc...its actually a subtle a d serious form of lack of business ethics..So , instead of the long and drawn out procedure I just submitted these pics for everyone to see what I'm experiencing. I will post an update of this transaction once this issue has been resolved to my satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Davida B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I'm truly surprised! I have a senior dog and a middle aged dog with anxiety. Both have bladder problems that just kept getting worse so we decided to get these. I am so happy we did. Every once in a while they can wiggle out of them but very rarely. It's cut the accidents down by 95%. They don't leak, look cute, they don't seem to mind wearing them and are easy to put on. Definitely measure to get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay on my french bulldog. I have tried everything but as soon as he starts walking around, he's able to wiggle himself right out. Maybe it's the shape of his little body?
customer_reviews.author: Holls

customer_reviews.title: I tried 3 brands and this is the winner
customer_reviews.text: I have my daughter's 19 lb pomeranian, and he marks everything. I can't stand it. As a last resort, we bought these belly bands/pants/diapers. I call them panties just to bug her. They fit well, except that he takes a large which I would not have guessed. The shape seems to conform to him fine and he doesn't mind wearing them. The other brands were wegreeco and Mkono. The wegreeco continued to shrink, and they just didn't fit his shape as well. The Mkono started to shed strings (but this was after a LOT of washing. ) So I'm back today to buy more of the Paw Legend. :) Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Finchly

customer_reviews.title: Well made but need to be wider.
customer_reviews.text: These belly bands work great. The only issue is that they are too narrow. My dog has learned how to stretch and get his pickle out. LOL He rubs his belly on the sofa which pushes it down. I have to put 2 on him to make it wider. I also put a baby diaper size one in the belly band. It absorbs the pee and keeps the band clean. So you just have to change the diaper through out the day. They wash up really nice and are extremely well made. Its extremely hard for them to get off, which is a good thing. And they are adorable! I do recommend them but wish they were wider.
customer_reviews.author: TERESA WRAY

customer_reviews.title: They fit snugly and are shaped so they fit nicely over the "offending area" without impeding movement or bunching ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit my "larger" Pomeranian, and my daughter's doe headed chihuahua at the smallest size. They fit snugly and are shaped so they fit nicely over the "offending area" without impeding movement or bunching up in the flank area. It take a bit for the dog to get used to them, and you'll get a few good laughs in while you watch them waddle about as they attempt to step over the band. They won't contain a full bladders worth of urine, but are perfect if you're preventing using them to prevent "marking" or old dog dribbles.
customer_reviews.author: memerrill

customer_reviews.title: Works like they should.
customer_reviews.text: These are working great. Have been leakproof. We started putting pads inside so we don’t need to wash so often. I’m using the large size on an elderly border collie who dribbles all the time and sometimes can’t hold it at night. I’ve had no leaks. I used the size medium on a miniature Pinscher and it works great but his slick hair and stubby tail make it easy to wiggle out of. Need suspenders on it for him. Not the belly bands fault. It works like it should. If putting pads inside it makes the band fit considerably tighter. Might consider that if your already close to the next size up when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Bandit1GreatDog

customer_reviews.title: Nearly two years and still working well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these nearly two years ago when we first adopted our dog. He may never be completely housebroken, and these solve the problem. I rinse them (with the cotton liners) in a mild soap and bleach solution. The black ones do not fade with the bleach. Just need a small amount of bleach to remove the odor. Always dry on lowest heat possible as it is nicer to the fabric and the velcro. I keep the diapers in a small simple human trash can and wash weekly. Spray the inside of the plastic trash can liner with angry orange pet odor deodorizer and the plastic liner will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: In Milwaukee

customer_reviews.title: Leakproof and comfy for fur babies!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonder!! I am sooo happy with this purchase. Our fur baby had spinal surgery a few months ago now, but still has no feeling in his back legs and the vet said he will unlikely ever walk or regain his bladder control. These are a life saver! Our baby is so excited to wear them and he can safely scoot around the house without a trail of pee and not be stuck in his bed in his cage. It gives him a much better quality of life and I can tell he’s comfy and so happy in these and I’m happy our carpet and tile is safe too! Thank you paw legend!
customer_reviews.author: Emjewel

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE STRESS and chasing after my dog to ensure that he doesn't MARK in my house.
customer_reviews.text: HE no longer marks in the house. He doesn't mind wearing these. His and my stress about this never ending situation is over. I wish I'd always used these when I had a problem with PEE. He doesn't even pee in them, since it's awkward for him to lift his leg, he doesn't! Did I mention I love these? I bought some for my daughter who also has a problem dog. At first I was concerned that he might tear them off. Not him. He acts like he doesn't know he's wearing them. If you're reading this review, you need these. Buy them.
customer_reviews.author: SCTucker

customer_reviews.title: Works almost too well
customer_reviews.text: We were at wits end trying to stop my yorkiepoo from marking around the house. We started using these diapers and they work great - too great! He definately hasnt marked anywhere but I also cant tell if he is trying to mark and going in the diaper - because they are so absorbent and dont release odor while on the dog. So Im not sure if the dog is holding it or just peeing on himself... These are super easy to wash - I just use hot water and dish soap - and dry fairly quickly. The size small was perfect for our 15 pounds dog. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Olivas-Arreola

customer_reviews.title: A Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My pit bull is a senior and has a hard time controlling his back legs now. When I got these I was skeptical but I am so happy I tried them. When he used it this wrap worked like a charm. It did not leak thru and with him emptying a full bladder it still could hold more. The only issue I had is they run smaller than expected. I need an XL.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Size chart wrong, runs small.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my senior dog. I used thier size chart... they were wrong. According to their chart my dog should be a small, but boy are they wrong! Unpackaged them and washed them before discovering this so unfortunitly can not return. I have used them but I cant velcro all the way so he often gets stuck to fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa R.

customer_reviews.title: One of the better bands I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Nice and wide and the velcro is ridiculously strong. I have a hard time pulling it apart, so I suspect these would be really hard for a dog to tear off. I'm not loving the elastic in the padded area. I assume it's meant to help hold urine in but it makes the material "shrink up" around my dog's private parts. Even though these are washable, I insert Poise pads for extra insurance. Would give this 5 stars if not for the elastic issue.
customer_reviews.author: Wucky Duck

customer_reviews.title: Hold-on there pee brain!
customer_reviews.text: The size is pretty correct, the construction is very well made, and very easy to clean. My wife uses miniature maxi pads inside rather than buying the more expensive ones made for it. As he grows will have to buy more but that's okay, he's absolutely worth it. BTW, he is a 3 pound, three month old Yorkie puppy and the XXS size is pretty correct, the construction is very well made, and very easy to clean. My wife uses miniature maxi pads inside rather than buying the more expensive ones made for it. As he grows we'll have to buy more but that's okay, he's absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: riggarob

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: These have been a godsend with my chihuahua. He came from animal control at two and wasn’t neutered. We immediately got him neutered but years later he still has a marking problem due to be neutered as an adult. These have been a life saver. I’ve repurchased multiple times. My only issue is just a heads up don’t throw in the dryer. You can machine wash but if you put in the dryer they shrink a lot. Also, they kept getting crazy looking with the dryer sheets getting caught on the velcro. But hand wash or just hang to dry after machine washing and you’ll be a okay.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Mostly satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The diapers work great, in a size medium, for my 10 pound chihuahua, however my tiny but chubby 7 pound chihuahua is between sizes- the medium is too big and the small is too small. So, for one dog they work great- the other one not so much. They launder great- turn them inside out and fasten the Velcro. I start them drying in the dryer then bring them out to air dry. The quality of the garment remains even after several washes, so far do good. I can recommend theses snd would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful belly Bands
customer_reviews.text: Wow, they are made the best that I have found yet, thick and waterproof and comfy for my older dog, that has issues leaking. They don't feel wet against the skin. Update these are my favorite belly bands I at first didn't care for it having two strips on the one side but that makes them even more adjustable, just ordered my second set because I don't care for the others an wanted to have extra so I dont have to wash everyday, I have started washing with dawn in the sink to get the pee smell out before I wash them in the washing machine, if I don't sometimes it still has a pee smell. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great for male dog incontinence
customer_reviews.text: Our older pit bull has begun having incontinece issues and was leaking all over his bed and our floor. We were constantly washing bedding and cleaning up after him. Now we just put on a clean belly band diaper and voila a lot less cleaning. They can be washed by hand or machine washed. Super easy on and off right at the door to go out. I think he actually doesn’t mind because now he doesn’t have to have multiple baths a week. These are great for leaky male dogs. Just what I was looking for. I like that they send covers for the exposed Velcro as well.
customer_reviews.author: PuttingGod1st

customer_reviews.title: Good size and durable.
customer_reviews.text: We like to use male wraps on our male puppies to help with house training. When our collie puppy outgrew the ones we had, I ordered these in size XL according to the measurement chart. They were a little big to start, but now they are perfect sized and he is getting to not need them. I like that they are different colors so you can tell which one he has been wearing. They are heavy duty and the Velcro is strong. My only issue is with the black interior, it is hard to tell when they are wet without smelling or touching.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: My male dogs take medication that makes them urinate a lot and gives them bladder spasms. I am using this in conjunction with the dog diapers. I keep them in place by putting the dogs in a onsie leaving the middle snap undone for the tail and leaving their harness on. So far so good. the small amount of urine that has been produces was easily absorbed. washes right up in the washer. Be advised these are very true to size. one of my dogs is just smaller than the cut off and the other is just bigger than the cut off so I took the smaller size. I do have to stretch a lot for the larger dog.
customer_reviews.author: CRN

customer_reviews.title: coverage and leak proof
customer_reviews.text: I like the larger size and thickness of these diapers. The quality is so much better than the ones I purchased (different brand) year ago. The velcro is very strong and well place. My dig cannot get them off. The leg elastic is just tight enough to stay tight around the leg to keep in place. The use of these diapers allow my dog to spend more time in the house which I am so grateful for. I will definately recommend to any one who needs this type of product for their dog.
customer_reviews.author: d cox

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: What I do like: this brand fits better than others I’ve bought. Very well made. Good colors. It’s a lifesaver- my elderly dog pees all the time and we wouldn’t be getting along very well if I had to clean that up constantly. What I don’t like is that this material gets quite smelly. I use a male absorbent pad (like a diaper) in addition to the wrap because it won’t hold the amount of urine my dog makes and I don’t have access to washing clothes every day. I’ve tried hand washing, but they really need machine washing to get rid of the odor.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great doggy diaper!
customer_reviews.text: My dog got very sick and started meds that caused him to drink large amounts of water. When I couldn't be home to let him out, these were a life saver! Although there were a couple times they leaked, overall they were super absorbent and fit well. My dog also gained a lot of weight in his belly so I was nervous they may not fit, but the XL was great with room to spare. The wide elastic bands makes them very is to get on and off. They wash up great and hold their form. A great product for any dog potty training or suffering from incontinence.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Great for night time wear for pups
customer_reviews.text: Because these are black it's a little more difficult to see if my old pup has wet himself, plus they are much more absorbent than other brands I had purchased. Because he just can't hold it anymore being a little old guy, these have been great at night. Sometimes he wakes up and they are heavy and sometimes not. They keep the leaks in and wash wonderfully. They even come with extra velcro covers if it doesn't fit well and the hook part is exposed. The small fit my pup perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: bookaholic

customer_reviews.title: These work well!
customer_reviews.text: These work well! Beats having to buy more or change out his pee pads... with these diapers my male dog can be more comfortable and not feel like he’s lying in his urine for too long. And not waste so many pee pads that we use to line his favorite bed... my dog is so spoiled... lol! Very easy to wash and live dry and ready to reuse. Had to buy a few sets to have clean ones ready. If I had to wish I would like if the manufacturer would add more padding in diaper...
customer_reviews.author: C.S

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for a long haired dog
customer_reviews.text: I tried them on my dog when I received them. Having a long haired dog with a long tail you can’t avoid having fur accidentally touch the Velcro. My dogs tail got stuck in it and I had to cut his tail fur to get it off. This required me muzzling him because the fur would’ve had to been ripped out of it if I didn’t cut it. Absolutely ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: christine calace

customer_reviews.title: I own a dog day care... I
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are just what I was looking for! They are wide so they cover a lot of area. They are pretty much odor free and extremely absorbent so it’s hard to tell if they are dirty or not. The Velcro is mighty strong so they won’t come off. The only advice I have is that you must turn them inside out and Velcro them together before washing in the washing machine. If you don’t they will stick together in one big clump. Did I mention I run an in home doggie day care so I use them every day. I will never consider changing brands...how can you improve on perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Land

customer_reviews.title: May cause some uncomfortable rubbing, needed some modification
customer_reviews.text: They’re secure, stay put, and my determined doggo can’t seem to wriggle them off or pull them off. Downside: the elastic rubs up against their sanitary area and actually ended up causing a wound which now has scarred after caring for it how my vet recommended. I cut the elastic out of the back of the wrap so it’s snug on his ribs but not tight near his hindquarters and it seems to have remedied the rubbing/friction. So they’re good and do what they’re supposed to - but I strongly recommend paying attention to your dog and their comfort - you may need to modify them like I had to
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: These are very nicely made and stay on very well little bulky but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very nicely made and stay on very well little bulky but better than being tight around his belly Chumley sées me coming with them and he will just up for me to put them on him becuz he knows we are. Going for ride or its time for bed I put panty liner in, because he's a young male feelings oats and will lift his leg when he at New places or. Long. Nights he won't go out if raining out? So he loves them They are good in washing machine so I would give them higher if I could
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Forget Diapers these are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a particular black Pug. He likes to mark his territory while at a family members home. Disposable diapers were the go to product, both expensive and saggy. These belly wraps were used for the 1st time since purchasing. A note explains the satisfaction over these.... " The belly band was great. Was wet (inside) when removed, but, didn't leak nor was wet on the underbelly. No odor and didn't have to worry about watching him because the belly band was so secure." This product is highly recommended, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K. O'Grady

customer_reviews.title: You will never smell mystery urine in your home again! Trains dog not to leak, even on accident!
customer_reviews.text: For our 3 and 4 lb Chihuahua, the XS is perfect! I was able to potty train into longer hours - and of course never peed in them. He knows he isn't able to pee,so leaving him free in the house, when we were not home is peace of mind. You don't even have to velcro them on tight, because it tricks the boy dogs into being able to hold it? So they don't even leak on accident! Belly bands are great, esp for the older and submissive guys!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit for my dog but good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a miniature pinscher who is on the chunky side but has a teeny waist and hips. These are nice looking but due to the design it was hard for me to put it on snug enough (time is precious when you're trying to cinch something around an older dog's waist). You have to pull it very snug but the elastic still has some give on the bottom, so a dog with hips that are the same size as his waist or smaller can wiggle out of it. The quality is nice on them, though, so maybe for another shaped dog they'd work.
customer_reviews.author: ItMe82

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely runs small. There is no way that this would fit a dog that is 20". It's tight on my 18" waisted dog, but I needed it immediately so there is not way to return and get the bigger one. Quite disappointed that I'll have to make an extender to fit my guy be able to fit into this. UPDATE: the company reached out to me regarding these. They were kind enough to give me a coupon to get the next size for free.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Buy next size up
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd had a temporary leaking problem so I measured him and bought the size recommended on the chart. It BARELY fits. Beyond that, it’s super absorbent. One time I forgot to take it off when I let him outside. He has a huge bladder and absolutely filled that diaper. It was pretty saggy when he came in but it didn’t leak. The one downside is, unless you wash these absolutely by themselves- no rags with them - the Velcro will pick up a lot of lint. And there’s a lot of Velcro. And no, hooking the Velcro together doesn’t help much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elastic leaves marks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 7 year old chi-terrier mix who has issues with peeing in the house at night. The small is almost too small and the medium is way too big for his little body. The big issue for me is the elastic part rubs against his junk and leaves marks, making me worry about using this kind long term. Edit: Paw Legend's customer service reached out to me after my review to ask for more details about my dog's dimensions and how the could make the order right. I'm very pleased with their exceptional customer service and would recommend these diapers simply for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Koderlyn

customer_reviews.title: I have repeatedly tried using these and I have not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have repeatedly tried using these and I have not had any success. I have had other people put them on since I thought maybe I was putting them on too loosely. It doesn't matter how it is put on they are always off by morning. It might be the way my dogs body is shaped. I am not sure but I know when we wake up in the morning our floors are full of urine and feces because my dog slips out of them. I will be looking for another brand/type.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash doggie diaper less worry and waste
customer_reviews.text: These diapers are the best! My elderly pug has many issues with his lower legs and incontinence. The pack of three is perfect as I wash them daily and hang them to dry. They keep him dry and my floors safe along with the piece of mind that they are not wasteful. The washable factor is great and I use no scented All on a speed-wash cycle hang to dry and done! Happy mom happy pug:) thanks for this product very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat purchase for me. The Velcro is very strong. You do need to close the Velcro before washing to avoid getting lint in the loops. I turn them inside out for washing and they wash well. I am not excited about the black liner, but my little guy goes a lot so I rarely have to worry about whether it is wet. I think it is a good product for the price. I would hate to think how much I would have paid for disposables over the last few months!
customer_reviews.author: K. Schoeller

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: I have three male mini dachshunds who, even though neutered, continually mark inside our house. I had had enough of constantly cleaning up after them and turned to these bands as a solution. So far so good! They are equipped with VERY strong Velcro and are VERY easy to clean. I ordered a pack of smalls, but may order a pack of extra smalls to test that size out as well. Of course at first they were furious I made them wear the band, but were over it and napping in them within 10 mins. Would definitely recommend these and would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using another top brand of the same type wrap that was getting rough and warn from daily washing. Rather than buy more of the same brand, I decided to try these. I am very pleased with the quality, fit, and fabric. They are extremely durable and wash up perfectly. I bought XL and the sizing is perfect...actually spacious. My handicapped male dog seems much more comfortable with the fit as well. Absorbency is impressive as well.
customer_reviews.author: COBandMOB

customer_reviews.title: These work great. We turn them insideout when we launder them ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great. We turn them insideout when we launder them and attach the Velcro so it won't grab onto fibers. We are using poise pads in addition to the diapers.
customer_reviews.author: roselady

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for dog having accidents
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about these doggie diaper holders. I use All-Absorb diaper liners under these and now my dog stays really dry. The velcro on the holders is super strong so my dog cannot wiggle out of them. You do have to use a liner as the holders are not absorbent themselves. I finally found a product that fits my tiny Papillon who is just 5 pounds (very tiny). I ordered size XS. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Dt

customer_reviews.title: Best in show!
customer_reviews.text: These dog wraps are great! Very strong Velcro. Extremely well made. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality. I purchased a different brand at Petco locally while waiting for this 3-pack to be delivered. I paid around $20 for 2. Those diapers were really thin, and the Velcro closure was sewn on so you didn't have any room to size up or down. These are so good and fit well. We've had no leaks either. Our dog, Upgrayedd, doesn't seem to mind the wrap at all. I 100% will buy these again if ever I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome. Made me love my tiny baby even more if thats possible! My itty bitty yorkie poo was a rescue and he was NOT trainable. These we line with a female bladded leakage pad (odor control) and my lil guy doesnt stink, it catches his tint sprays, and ee just take it off and on changing the pads out as needed. Best life saver ever. Saved my sanity!!!! Highly recommended with the bladder leak pads!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these due to our new greyhound sporadically marking/spritzing around the house as a training tool. I was super impressed by the quality! The velcro is strong and he was unable to pull these off on his own. The velcro is so strong even I have to tug to get it undone which is fine with me. This means there will be no accidental slippage. The absorbance built in surprised me as well. I do not think you can go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: mdrenna

customer_reviews.title: Too wide for my small pomeranians. Urine soaks thru
customer_reviews.text: These belly bands are made very well, however, they are way too wide for my little Pomeranians. When they pee, it gets on a wide area of fur. I'd rather have a thin more narrow belly band and put a disposable pee pad in it. The urine burns their fur and I need the pee area concentrated in one small area. Might work better with a larger dog. Other than the width, it matches the listed measurements. It has a built in pad and it washes up really well. Plus the urine soaks through to the outside. Not cool when you want to pick up your poms and give them a hug.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Wilson

customer_reviews.title: patterned diaper
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand for my dog many times. All have been the plain colored diaper. I tried the patterned one and the urine does not seep into the diaper. It rolls out from the side or when taking diaper off flows on to the floor. What a mess.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Love them and buying more!
customer_reviews.text: We have had issues with our shorkie peeing everywhere! These have saved us. I measured around him and went off of their size chart. He was 14” around, that was the top measurement for the small so I decided to go with the medium. They fit great and since they cinched on the edges there is no chance of leaking. They have been easy to wash as well. I’m about to order another set, I just wanted to make sure I had the right size first.
customer_reviews.author: rjbrown233

customer_reviews.title: Paw Legend Washable Doggy Diapers
customer_reviews.text: They were as described. Sturdy and well-made. However, I had to return them, as they were enormous on my dog. I followed their directions for measuring the dog in order to get the right size. They were so enormous, it was ridiculous. It may not even be their fault. Each dog is different, of course. They just need to revisit their directions for sizing your dog. The girth was just a little too large and could have been dealt with due to the Velcro strips, but the width, well, the wraps went all the way up to just behind my dog's front legs. Pretty awkward!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Holleschau

customer_reviews.title: An absolute life/furniture/rug saver!!
customer_reviews.text: These are an absolute life saver!!! I have a 7lb Papillion that has a terrible habit of marking is territory in our home. We have tried everything over the years and at times just gave up and decided to continuously clean the messes. Until I found these wraps!! Unlike conventional dog diapers, these stay in place and our dog tolerates them. They are very absorbent, strong velcro and cover all the right places. Our pup is 7lbs and 11.5 inches around his waist. We ordered the xs and they fit perfectly! Seriously beyond grateful for these little things!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable except for the Velcro.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the extra large size for my 95lb totally incontinent German Shepherd. The absorbency was good but of insufficient capacity. Despite lining the bands with a pair of overnight sanitary napkins, three changes per day were necessary. Washing after removing the napkins involved soaking in water and a dry spin before a full cycle in the washing machine. The belly bands were still functional after 6 months, but the Velcro would no longer hold tight.
customer_reviews.author: Philsum

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. Please create velcro extenders as a remedy to this. I got medium as my dog is 14" and reviews said they ran small. But there is not enough overlap to keep them on without feeling like I'm cutting off his circulation Extenders would be an easy and cheaper solution than exchanging.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: My elderly male bulldog is becoming incontinent. I've tried using small pads (for humans with this problem) to sleep on in bed, but he wanders around and they haven't been too successful. I ordered these the other day and the first night using them, they worked exactly as advertised. The bed was clean in the morning and the diaper had some added weight to it when I removed it for him to go outside. He's still getting used to walking around with it on, but I think this is something we can both live with.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix1966

customer_reviews.title: My guys do not feel embarrassed - like the full diaper
customer_reviews.text: My two males seem to understand the full diaper. : { This wrap must be far more comfortable, too. They look cute in the Sumo wrestler band. Easy on when dashing out the door ...and easy off when I come home. I will buy another set. The size MEDIUM fits my Cairn Terrier who measures 18" around and my skinny mixed terrier who only measures 15" inches. Strong Velco, so there is no wiggling out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Down2Earth

customer_reviews.title: No Leakage and great fit!
customer_reviews.text: My Weimaraner is 14yo. and with aging dogs comes bladder control problems. I purchased the XL. The belly wrap is about 6" WIDE which is fantastic for coverage- no leaks! It has a thick super absorbent pad and strong velco closure - pad covers edge-to-edge with 3 wide hooking strips. They do great in the washer. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is the pad is thick and it takes it a long time to dry (For me, it took 3 rounds in the dryer. Might be less time in a newer machine). That being said...with the coverage, construction and comfort for my boy, It is the best belly wrap we've tried.
customer_reviews.author: WeimMom

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I always use a female panty liner with this belly band. That way I can dispose of the liner and keep the belly band from absorbing too much urine. They wash up well and seem to be soft and comfortable on my male chihuahua who likes to "mark" in the house. Hopefully, when he is neutered this problem will be alleviated. But, for now, it gives me some peace of mind. I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: tkeao

customer_reviews.title: Not Every Order is the Same
customer_reviews.text: I am re-rating this item after reordering. I originally purchased these in August 2018 (pictured on the left). When I reordered them March 2019 (pictures on the right). They are different than the stock photo and more cheaply made on the reordered. First Order vs. Second Order 1. Velcro is cheaper/thinner 2. Velcro is in two small strips instead of one large 3. Material inside is thinner 4. The elastic on the sides is looser 5. The width is over an inch larger. (6. Color shades are slightly different.) I am very disappointed because I reordered them specifically for the extremely high product quality.
customer_reviews.author: bridget ventura

customer_reviews.title: Nappies
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, true to size. Velcro is heavy duty and a little difficult to remove on small dogs. This velcro would be great for larger dogs. Colors great for my little one. Material seems like it will hold up well. Wash well, but let air dry so they will last longer and don't want them to shrink. I use inexpensive sanitary pads to keep from having to wash so much and odor at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnelle

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my 11 year old 8 lb chihuahua. I use poise pads in the band. To launder I place Velcro together and place in mesh bag, and hang to dry. George was not housebroken when I adopted him 6 years ago and after months of working with him, I realized he was never going to stop marking. He wears a belly and night and day and has never seemed to mind. Belly bands have made both of us happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ratqueen Reader

customer_reviews.title: Heaven Sent
customer_reviews.text: We have tried EVERYTHING with our Chihuahua Dachsund. He pees on boxes, bags we rang home, chairs, etc. We tried diapers, sprays, timeouts and nothing has worked. I found these and they are perfect! He of course tried to make us think he couldn’t walk in it, but after a few minutes of us not relenting he miraculously could walk. These are amazing and I highly recommend them!! He has a waist of 12 inches so we went with a small and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Prevents Marking ...
customer_reviews.text: My eight-year-old Yorkie is fully house trained but for whatever reason -- possibly two little female daschunds, when being babysat by friends, he started to mark. It would be unacceptable in my home and I don't want it to happen to anyone else. So I purchased these belly bands, which are advertised as being washable. They don't suggest this but I suggest using women's pantiliners inside. I have a suspicion that he won't raise his leg at all with a belly band on but if he does, he'll pee on the pantiliner. A win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Meier Wright

customer_reviews.title: They are big enough for my 100 lb. Lab
customer_reviews.text: I do not use them as a diaper but as a wrap for a disposable diaper for my Lab. He cannot control the urine anymore. They are not easy to put on with the diaper. They tend to turn so they are not flat when attaching. You need to pull them once they are on so they are flat. However, that said, they are large, comfortable for him and hold a diaper exactly where you put it.
customer_reviews.author: Gardening Gal

customer_reviews.title: A thousand stars!!
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me a few times! Not only does it prevent from drops all over the house; it captures a full no 1! I have a 14yr old pup, he's my heart <3 but yes, with age he has some accidents every now and then. Especially also because we live in a high rise, sometimes it just takes too long to get outside. He peed in one of these twice now and it really captures the whole thing! And believe me when I say he has a laaarge bladder. It has to really be able to capture A LOT when my dog goes in it. I ordered another set! Highly highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EuropeanCaliGRL

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of use! I add a sanitary or incontinence pad so I don’t have to wash every time he has an accident. Because the doggy I’m using these on is between sizes, the Velcro closure is partly exposed on the smaller size and since the hooks are on the bottom and not the top, the hooks are sticking to everything and snagging those items. The Velcro hooks should be on the top and the loops on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: So worth it and found them just in time!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using sanitary pads in these diapers. My dog is on Furosemide so he really “goes”. The pads help. I keep a pan in my laundry room with cold water and vinegar and soak the diapers before washing. We started out with three, then moved to six and now have nine diapers which seems about right. Sport is a 13 pound 13 year old long hair Dachshund. In these photos he is wearing the beautiful sage green. The other colors are Navy and grey. I chose those colors because they fit his red hair color palette. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy O

customer_reviews.title: Work beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for two dachshunds who 14 years old. They work beautifully. I use a sanitary pad in them as we need them sooner than washing and drying is done. I bought the small. They fit the 12 lb boy but is a little big but still works well. The small fit the 16 lb boy just right. I bought another set after the first one worked so well. Note: these boys are brothers but do not live in the same house. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: ljc311

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 year old incontinent shih tzu. He pees ALOT. I purchased these for the waterpoof part. His old wrap always leaked and was wet. He absolutely needs an additional pad inside the wrap. I purchase the walmart overnight options pads (poise knockoff) which are very large and this wrap accommodates them well. No leaks, no wetness. Very happy with these. Because he pees so much i wouldnt attempt it without the additional pad. Very true to size. No bunching. He finds them comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: These things saved my life. My recently rescued shih tzu seemingly has a leakage issue as I have found myself cleaning up more pee than I did with my old cat. These diapers appear to be comfortable for him too although it took time adjusting. He now plays and runs with them on. We mostly only have the diapers on if we are out for awhile or are busy around the house where we cannot keep a full eye on him. These diapers are definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Rotolo

customer_reviews.title: About a 4 hour fill up
customer_reviews.text: Works well, just got to figure out how tight to put them on your dog. First couple of tries he somehow weaseled out of it. My 21 year old dachshund likes to act like I've totally cut off all use to his back legs after putting the belly band on. Lol Don't let them fool you! It lasts for about a 4hour work shift. If I have to work longer, then my neighbor comes over to let the dog out and switch out to a new belly band. It's been a lifesaver though. My dog is still alert and spunky; but when he's gotta go, he's gotta go.
customer_reviews.author: Elledy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Has caught two accidents by my little old pup.. he's going to be 15 and has a heart condition and Cushings.. he's had two accidents on the bed before I purchased this produce .. not his fault.. he can't get down by himself anymore so now if I don't hear him "ask" to get down to go out the accident is caught by the belly band.. they're soft and he doesn't seem to mind it at all.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it should be.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it should be. Much easier than using puppy pads. Easy to clean- just throw them in the washer. Biggest downfall is that the lining is black and you can't tell if there is pee on it without either smelling it or touching it. Keeps my boy dry and clean. Not tight or uncomfortable for him (he even wags his tail when we out it on him). He is a 14 pound Chi-poo and I got him size Medium and I think it fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: The Paynes

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found these!! I bought these for my lil pisser, he hates them, but I love them. He's tried to pee while wearing them [although a lot less now] and although you can smell it and feel a tad bit of dampness on the diaper, overall it holds the majority of the mistakes inside. I suggested to two other people that they buy them and they too are happy to have found them.
customer_reviews.author: GINA

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of difficulty with my Miniature Pinscher marking in the house. I have tried many remedies but this one seems most effective. My dog is surprisingly cooperative when it comes to putting the belly band on or taking it off. So far he has not peed in the belly band so I can not speak for it's absorbancy but as a deterrent it seems to be working well. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Never a leak or accident.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit. My pups stands still now and let’s me put these on. He knows now he can run around in the whole house with his diaper on. He was a rescue dog and he is nine yrs old and he can’t be trusted not to mark his territory in my house. At first he was afraid of the ripping noise from the Velcro but has learned he has freedom with them on. He is happy and so am I. You will be a happy owner of a male dog with these
customer_reviews.author: Rhita

customer_reviews.title: Quality and functionality questionable
customer_reviews.text: I have a 26 lb 16 month old French Bulldog. Basically a tube of meat with a head/legs. He's great but likes to mark when no one's looking. I tried these, he would run around and it would slide off on it's own (fit was perfect - just didn't work with his body size/type/shape). One of the bands the velcro ripped right off the fabric out of the package. Looked good on paper, didn't translate for my dog in reality.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cute and velcro is strong.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old poodle can't control his bladder anymore so I bought him some of this belly wraps and they look comfortable and he is used to wearing a band so he doesn't try to take it off. The velcro is nice and strong. I put a poise pad inside this belly band because the dog diapers are pricey. Anyways I don't want to be washing this pads so I bought the disposable pads to put inside this wrap. They're cute too btw.
customer_reviews.author: FK

customer_reviews.title: SANITY & FURNITURE & CARPET SAVER!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3-pack and the solid black 3-pack, and I am so pleased with how well they work! For some unknown reason, ever since the exterminator sprayed around the inside of the house, our neutered, well-trained, 6-year-old dog has begun marking all around the house. We had to find a solution quickly, because nothing I was doing was helping...scolding, ignoring, etc. Then I found these on Amazon and bought them promptly. They have SAVED my sanity, my furniture, my carpet, and my dog! I still have to find a way to prevent him from marking, but at least it is all contained in the belly wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome doggy diapers
customer_reviews.text: I love these doggy diapers, I’ve placed 2 separate orders and in 2 sizes small and medium. Our chihuahuas have the small one and they are very comfortable with them. Our English bulldog puppy of 3 months wears the size medium and he’s very comfortable with them as well. They don’t have a bad smell once washed, I do wash them with baking soda and tide pods and they don’t fade in color. So I recently purchased a large for our English bulldog, I took a picture of the 3 sizes side-by-side.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: I love these!!
customer_reviews.text: MAJOR UPDATE!!! I am so freaking happy! These appear to have cured my German Shepard of marking! After a few weeks of attempting to mark while wearing these, suddenly he has stopped marking while wearing these at all!. And this morning, I accidentally let him out without removing them. He is black so they blend really well, anyway, by the time I realized it I figured they would be wet but nope! I can't tell you how happy I am! I love these, apparently, my dog can't stop himself from marking. They hold their shape well after washing, too.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my small dogs who don't go outside in winter. Sometimes they have accidents because they are handicap. These diapers are easy to use and wash. Comfortable for my dogs and fit them great. I will buy again. Also great because it's cheaper than buying so many packs of diapers and filling up the Earth with so much waste in landfills.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Beware it's not 100% leak-proof.
customer_reviews.text: So, first time using before wash no leaks. I hand washed with soap and let air dry. This time the diaper started to feel wet on the outside when he used it. Decided to but some inserts but the 3rd time around outside was soaked. Yes they work. However, I would expect the outside to remain dry since it's suppose to be water proof. Unfortunately will be trying another brand
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Seem really nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have a male dog who has out of nowhere decided to lift his leg. It's a hard behavior to correct because it's such a small amount I may not see it right away, so he doesn't get scolded. I ordered these and they seem nice and thick, Velcro seems sturdy and the fabric is nice. He hasn't peed in one yet, so we'll see how they clean up, but so far so good. I can tell he isn't pleased with his new accessory, but he didn't resist or try to remove it. That is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

product_meta.title: Paw Legend Washable Dog Belly Wrap Diapers for Male Dog (3 Pack)
feature_bullets: DOG DIAPERS SMALL - Comes in Seven different sizes for small dogs, medium dogs and large dogs. Size Small is Suitable for waist measurement:11"-14", Please measure your dog's waist right in front of the back legs to ensure a good fit, please loose some space when you measure your dog to ensure comfortable.

THREE COLORS PER PACKAGE -We choose three trendy colors for our friend,one each of DARK BLUE, SKY BLUE and BLACK. Your doggie will wear the pant with pride and looks fabulous. They are extremely precious gifts, and creating a beautiful life for your bosom friends.

SOFT AND COMFORTABLE -We choose the prime quality materials to increase your dog's comfort and acceptance,without "crinkly" or uncomfortable texture,your dog will never want to take them off. Hook & loop closures are quick and easy to secure,which is durable and sticky,keeping your dog diaper stay in place well.

HIGHLY ABSORBENT MALE DOG WRAPS-Useful for untrained puppies, dogs that suffer from incontinence due to excitement urination, age, or illness. A super absorbent pad sewn right into the bands,the outer layer is a 100% waterproof to prevent leaks and damage to rugs, carpets, upholstered chairs and sofas.Our washable doggie diapers male will keep you, your house and your pet happy.Saving your life!

MACHINE WASHABLE - Our washable belly bands for dogs are more economical and environmentally friendly than the disposable dog diapers. They can be thrown in with you normal laundry without any issues.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
